name: Rockman Battle & Fighters
description: Rockman: Battle & Fighters (ロックマン バトル&ファイターズ Rokkuman Batoru Ando Faitāzu) is a fighting video game in the Mega Man series of video games. It was only released in Japan on the SNK Neo Geo Pocket Color handheld system. It is a portable version of the two arcade game fighting games Mega Man: The Power Battle, and Mega Man 2: The Power Fighters. The game involves choosing one of four characters and fighting through a series of boss battles.
